function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on low ACH in HVAC systems","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Increase ACH to recommended levels for respiratory isolation and procedure rooms","Technologies":"Upgrading HVAC systems for higher ACH, installing air purifiers, using UV germicidal irradiation","People":"Occupants of public buildings, especially in densely populated areas","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequacy of HVAC systems for infection control","Impact":"Limited ability to prevent transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing air purifiers, using UV germicidal irradiation, increasing ACH to recommended levels","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV germicidal irradiation, HVAC system upgrades","People":"Occupants of public buildings, especially in densely populated areas","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Complexity of ventilation efficiency calculation","Impact":"Difficulty in accurately assessing the effectiveness of ventilation systems in preventing transmission","Mitigation":"Use of mass balance Wells-Riley equation for estimation, obtaining good estimates of particle generation rates","Technologies":"Wells-Riley equation, particle generation rate estimation tools","People":"HVAC engineers, public health authorities, facility managers","Owner":"Building owners, HVAC engineers"}]}
